overview:
Co-founder OfeliaFeliz SA March 2011 – Present (1 year 2 months)

Ofelia Feliz is an e-commerce marketplace and community that focuses on handmade and vintage goods across Latin America and Spain.

Based in Buenos Aires, it currently covers Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Spain, México, Perú, Uruguay and Venezuela.

More info: http://www.ofeliafeliz.com.ar/prensa (Spanish)

Sr. OSS Analyst Cablevisión (Sole Proprietorship) Telecommunications industry July 2010 – September 2011 (1 year 3 months)

  • Main developer for the Automated Advertising System (Argentina, Uruguay and Paraguay) for Cablevision SA
  • CMTS, Cable modem, and power supply Monitoring System using SNMP protocol for Fibertel SA

Sr. PHP Consultant for Cancillería Argentina UNDP January 2008 – August 2010 (2 years 8 months)

  • Developed Intranet and Internet applications based on PHP and MySQL.
  • Operated and maintained Apache, PHP, SVN, MySQL and LDAP servers.
  • Ensured Drupal and CodeIgniter implementations.
  • Project Leader for the International Trade Secretary.

DiReggio Advertising August 2007 – January 2008 (6 months)

  • CodeIgniter and OsCommerce implementations.
  • HSBC Bank: Development, Implementation and Administration of HSBC New York’s bank back office. (ASP – MySQL). PHP Developer - Network Administrator

Fundación Manantiales February 2005 – July 2007 (2 years 6 months)

  • Maintained and developed website (HTML, Flash, PHP, MySQL).
  • Supported and maintained local servers. Freelance PHP developer Freelance PHP developer Privately Held; Myself Only; Information Technology and Services industry December 2003 – February 2005 (1 year 3 months)
